definition: Beijing Aeronautical and Astronautical Institute (abbr. to 北航院)
pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Hang2 kong1 Xue2 yuan4

sentences.english: Advanced Aeronautics booster color changes for Apollo and Carrier Drones.
sentences.chinese: 先進航空學將會改變阿波羅和艦載機的加速器顏色。

sentences.english: He devoted every spare moment to aeronautics.
sentences.chinese: 他把他所有多餘的時間用在航空學上。

sentences.english: Pai Ch'ung-hsi then took over as principal of the aviation academy and as commander of the air force.
sentences.chinese: 隨後白崇禧作爲空軍司令員和航空學院校長接管空軍。

sentences.english: At present, the management system has been used in Nanjing Aeronautical Institut…
sentences.chinese: 該系統已在南京航空學院財務部門使用，效果良好。

sentences.english: At present, the management system has been used in Nanjing Aeronautical Institute and satisfactory results, have been obtained.
sentences.chinese: 該系統已在南京航空學院財務部門使用，效果良好。

sentences.english: They were pilots in the early days of aviation.
sentences.chinese: 萊特兄弟是航空學先驅。

sentences.english: Pilots of large aircraft are masters of aviation.
sentences.chinese: 大型飛行器的駕駛員是航空學方面的專家。

sentences.english: Aeronautics enables us to overcome great distances.
sentences.chinese: 航空學使我們能征服遠距離。

sentences.english: A 'concept' is a group of aeronautical features, which are logically linked together.
sentences.chinese: 一個“概念”就是一組邏輯相互關聯的航空學特性。

sentences.english: My uncle was studying aeronautics at Queensland University.
sentences.chinese: 我叔叔當時正在昆士蘭大學學習航空學。

sentences.english: Aviation is a subject that challenges one's encourage.
sentences.chinese: 航空學是一門挑戰人的勇氣的學科。

sentences.english: Wright brothers were pioneers in aviation.
sentences.chinese: 萊特兄弟是航空學先驅。

sentences.english: Mr. Li Yongfa, Professor, the First Aviation University of Air Force.
sentences.chinese: 李永法，教授，空軍第一航空學院。
